bb.desc: 10 combo Earth attack on single foe (damage relative to remaining HP, boosts own critical rate), restores HP for 3 turns, probable KO resistance, probable evasion for 2 turns, boosts own max HP & adds Earth barrier
bb.name: Forgive Our Sins

dictionary.description: The shotguns that Teresa used to punish the wicked had almost no recoil, and could shoot bullets at a terrifying speed. She took out the ruffians of the band she had once belonged with incredible ease, and yet not a single one of their bullets ever managed to hit her—a miracle rewarding her faith. Once Teresa made sure that the young woman wielding the relic guns had won against the false messenger of the gods, she set off on a journey with her. The legends of the "fighting nun" heard of in various regions today are said to have begun around that time.
dictionary.evolution:
You don't believe I'm a nun?
Then why else would I be dressed like this?
O ye of little faith, there might be no saving you.
dictionary.fusion:
It's time to repent!
So if you don't want your head to be blown clean off,
you better start confessing!
dictionary.summon:
That was a close one, don't you think?
But fear not, for the gods forgive
all of our sins in this sanctuary.

extra skill.desc: 100% spark damage when Atk Boosting Type Sphere is equipped, 25% critical damage and adds ignore Def to attack for all allies, 30-50% BB gauge consumed reduction & negates all status ailments and Atk, Def, Rec reduction
extra skill.name: Sacred Tome: Chapter 10
